items.summary: Neraysho Kasanwirjo lijkt Feyenoord te verruilen voor Fortuna Sittard. Alleen de medische keuring scheidt de 23-jarige verdediger nog van een tijdelijke transfer naar de nummer elf van de Eredivisie.

items.summary: De Toekomst van Oranje is terug. Voetbal International sprak in deze serie in het verleden met toptalenten zoals Cody Gakpo, Brian Brobbey en de gebroeders Timber. items.title: Wintertransfers Eredivisie seizoen 2025/26: alle clubs op een rij
items.summary: De transferperiode is weer losgebarsten. In dit overzicht van VI vind je alle afgeronde, door clubs bevestigde, wintertransfers van de achttien Eredivisie-clubs. Clubs in Nederland kunnen tot en met 3 februari spelers aantrekken.

items.title: Liam Rosenior confirmed as Chelsea head coach on contract to 2032
items.summary: He arrives from Strasbourg to replace Enzo Maresca ‚ÄòI cannot turn down Chelsea,‚Äô says former Hull coach Liam Rosenior has been confirmed as Chelsea‚Äôs head coach on a contract to 2032, describing the opportunity to replace Enzo Maresca at Stamford Bridge as one he could not turn down. Rosenior has left Strasbourg, Chelsea‚Äôs partner club, after holding talks over the role on Monday. He said at a Strasbourg press conference on Tuesday: ‚ÄúI have had interest from many clubs, including Champions League clubs, which I have always been open with to [our president] Marc [Keller] and our ownership. I will love this club for the rest of my life but I cannot turn down Chelsea.‚Äù Continue reading...

items.title: West Brom sack Ryan Mason as head coach after 10th straight away defeat
items.summary: Mason was appointed in June on three-year contract West Brom 18th in the Championship after latest loss West Brom have sacked Ryan Mason as their head coach after a stoppage-time defeat at Leicester on Monday left the club 18th in the Championship. It was the team‚Äôs 10th away defeat in a row and ended the 34-year-old‚Äôs tenure after seven months. Mason was appointed on a three-year deal after holding a variety of roles at Tottenham, including interim manager and assistant to Ange Postecoglou. West Brom said two members of Mason‚Äôs staff, Nigel Gibbs and Sam Pooley, had also left. Continue reading...
